general.byline: CG Generalist in London, UK, He/Him
general.about: Unreal Engine artist (MA Games Art, B.Arch) with over six years of experience crafting real-time 3D environments, animations, and interactive VR/AR applications. My architectural background provides a unique perspective on level design and spatial storytelling, complemented by expertise in advanced lighting, look-dev, optimization, and Blueprint scripting gained through my work on games, VR projects, and interactive application development. Driven to explore technical art and procedural methods to realize artistic goals, with a passion for integrating technology to enhance storytelling.

workExperience.heading: 3D Generalist at Intellectual Point
workExperience.description:
* Archviz (still and animated) and motion-design, for marketing and in-house usage. Environment design, look-dev, and rendering.

* VR experiences for educational and training purposes. Environment design, Blueprint scripting, packaging, and implementation. 

* Virtual Production and Real-Time compositing. Environment design, motion graphics, pipeline development, packaging, and implementation.
workExperience.title: 3D Generalist

workExperience.heading: Lighting/Level Artist at S-Game Studio
workExperience.description:
* Designed and implemented lighting for mid-large scale environments in UE5, balancing aesthetic requirements with performance optimization to meet strict budget constraints and art direction guidelines.

* Created detailed landscapes and terrains for exterior environments, ensuring immersive and playable levels.

* Placed and modified props and hero assets based on greybox designs, following art direction briefs to achieve the desired visual narrative. 

* Developed and integrated dynamic weather effects and ambient VFX.
workExperience.title: Lighting/Level Artist

workExperience.heading: Motion Designer at Design Factory India
workExperience.description:
* Produced motion graphics and visuals for large-scale displays in museums and exhibition spaces. 

* Created solutions for technical and creative aspects of projection mapping animations on large-scale exterior and interior surfaces.

* Responsibilities also included research, concept development, copywriting, photo editing, illustrations, UI design, sound design, 3D modeling and rendering, and client presentations.
workExperience.title: Motion Designer

workExperience.heading: Architectural Visualiser at Point Construction
workExperience.description:
* Real-time archviz walkthroughs and cinematics with UE4. Environment design, look-dev, and rendering.

* Motion design and graphics for marketing and in-house usage.
workExperience.title: Architectural Visualiser

workExperience.heading: Technical Artist at VRRT
workExperience.description: * UE4 tech artist for various visualization projects, including archviz, product design, and interactive demos.
workExperience.title: Technical Artist

workExperience.heading: Architectural Intern at Innovarch
workExperience.description: * Worked with a team of architects to create technical drawings, linear 3D visualizations, and walkthroughs for residential and commercial projects.
workExperience.title: Architectural Intern

education.heading: MA Games Art and Design at University of Hertfordshire

certifications.heading: Introduction to User Experience Design from Coursera
certifications.name: Introduction to User Experience Design
